what: Truncate a character string by bytesize. — byte_trunc

title: Truncate a character string by bytesize. — byte_trunc
code: x <- "This string is moderately long" byte_trunc(x, 20) #> [1] "This string is moder"  y <- "こんにちは" byte_trunc(y, 10) #> [1] "こんに"
